<small>Aramaic form: [[H5326]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֻצַּב‎</span> [[Nah.2.8|Nah 2:8]] dubious; perhaps textual error; see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצב‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצָּלָה‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצל‎</span>. 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצַב‎</span> verb **Niph\`al** ==take one's stand, stand== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּב‎</span> ***id.*** (rare), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצָּבָה‎</span> noun ***taking a stand***; Phoenician (Punic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מנצבת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצבת‎</span> ***monument*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>325</sup>; Nabataean, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצב‎</span> ***set up***; Zinjirli ***id., statue***, all [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>325</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>82</sup>; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצבא‎</span> ***image***, Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצב‎</span> ***id.***, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VOJ viii (1894), 12</sup>, compare [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>l.c</sup>.; perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***naƒâbu***</u></abbr> Tel Amarna, [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>TA 24\*b</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְצַב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***set up, erect, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> sign, mark, way-mark***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצב‎</span> ***cippus*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. 23</sup> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>95</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxx (1876), 115 f.</sup> [[BDB#Derenb|Derenb]]<sup>Jas, 1883, Aug.-Sept. 244</sup>; Minaean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצב‎</span> ***statue*** (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מנצב‎</span> HOM<sup>Südar. Chrest. 128</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְּבָה‎</span> [[Ps.45.10|Ps 45:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּ֫בָה‎</span> [[Gen.37.7|Gen 37:7]]; [[Prov.8.2|Prov 8:2]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִצַּבְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Exod.7.15|Exod 7:15]] + 2 t.; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְּבוּ‎</span> [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִצְּבוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.33.8|Exod 33:8]] Participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּב‎</span> [[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּבָה‎</span> [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצֶּ֫בֶת‎</span> [[1Sam.1.26|1Sam 1:26]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּבִים‎</span> [[Exod.5.20|Exod 5:20]] +; feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּבוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.1.26|1Sam 1:26]] — 

**1. a.** ***station oneself, take one's stand***, for definite purpose, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location (***by, on***) [[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]]; [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]]; [[Gen.28.13|Gen 28:13]]; [[Exod.7.15|Exod 7:15]]; [[Exod.33.21|Exod 33:21]]; [[Exod.34.2|Exod 34:2]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.17.9|Exod 17:9]]; [[Exod.18.14|Exod 18:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.23.6|Num 23:6]]; [[Num.23.17|Num 23:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); [[Amos.7.7|Amos 7:7]]; [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]]; [[Prov.8.2|Prov 8:2]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.3.13|Isa 3:13]] ***taketh his stand to plead***; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location [[Exod.5.20|Exod 5:20]]; [[Ps.82.1|Ps 82:1]] (of God), compare [[Num.22.23|Num 22:23]]; [[Num.22.31|Num 22:31]]; [[Num.22.34|Num 22:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמְּכָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[1Sam.1.26|1Sam 1:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span> [[Deut.29.9|Deut 29:9]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶתַח‎</span> [[Num.16.27|Num 16:27]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.18.16|Judg 18:16]]; [[Judg.18.17|Judg 18:17]] absolute [[Lam.2.4|Lam 2:4]] (on text see Löhr). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***stand = be stationed*** (by appointment, or in fulfilment of duty), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person (sitting or lying) [[Gen.45.1|Gen 45:1]]; [[1Sam.4.20|1Sam 4:20]]; [[1Sam.22.6|1Sam 22:6]]; [[1Sam.22.7|1Sam 22:7]]; [[1Sam.22.17|1Sam 22:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְַמִֿשְׁמַרְתַּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Isa.21.8|Isa 21:8]] ***stand at my watchman's post*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹמֵד‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמִינְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.45.10|Ps 45:10]] absolute [[2Sam.13.31|2Sam 13:31]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***take an upright position, stand***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקוּמוּ וְנ‎</span> [[Exod.33.8|Exod 33:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּתַח‎</span> location), compare [[Gen.37.7|Gen 37:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; of sheaf); of waters, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְמוֺנֵֿד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]] (song). 

**2.** ***be stationed*** = ***appointed*** over (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>), [[1Sam.22.9|1Sam 22:9]]; [[Ruth.2.5|Ruth 2:5]]; [[Ruth.2.6|Ruth 2:6]] with Samuel ***presiding over*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>) ***them*** [[1Sam.19.20|1Sam 19:20]]. Hence 

**3.** Participle as substantive deputy, prefect (***as appointed, deputed***), only [[1Kgs.4.5|1Kgs 4:5]]; [[1Kgs.4.7|1Kgs 4:7]]; [[1Kgs.5.7|1Kgs 5:7]]; [[1Kgs.5.30|1Kgs 5:30]]; [[1Kgs.9.23|1Kgs 9:23]]; [[2Chr.8.10|2Chr 8:10]] (all of Solomon's officers; so also [[2Chr.8.10|2Chr 8:10]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], &lt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נציב‎</span>), [[1Kgs.22.48|1Kgs 22:48]] (of Edom). 

**4.** ***stand firm***, figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלאָֿדָם נִצָּב‎</span> [[Ps.39.6|Ps 39:6]] ***every man***, (even) ***the firm-standing***, is wholly vanity (but expression strange, and text dubious); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Ps.119.89|Ps 119:89]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s word); ***that which stands firm*** [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]] (Israel under figure of sheep), but dubious; [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] leave untranslated; [[BDB#Now|Now]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנַּחֲלָה‎</span> ***diseased***.

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּיב‎</span> [[1Kgs.16.34|1Kgs 16:34]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצַּבְתָּ‎</span> [[Gen.21.29|Gen 21:29]]; [[Ps.74.17|Ps 74:17]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּ֫יבוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.26|Jer 5:26]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצִּיב‎</span> [[Josh.6.26|Josh 6:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצֵּב‎</span> [[Deut.32.8|Deut 32:8]] (dubious; in poetry for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיּ‎</span> [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 233a</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]; rhythmical shortening [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:109k»§ 109k</sup>; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַצִּב‎</span> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Da|Da]]<sup>Synt. p. 94</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּצֶּבֿ‎</span> [[2Sam.18.18|2Sam 18:18]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּצִּיבֵ֫נוּ‎</span> [[Lam.3.12|Lam 3:12]] ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּ֫יבִי‎</span> [[Jer.31.21|Jer 31:21]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצִּיב‎</span> [[1Sam.13.21|1Sam 13:21]]; [[1Chr.18.3|1Chr 18:3]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצִּיב‎</span> [[1Sam.15.12|1Sam 15:12]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּיב‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]): — 

**1.** ***station, set:*** with accusative, ewes [[Gen.21.28|Gen 21:28]]; [[Gen.28.29|Gen 28:29]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבַד‎</span> ***apart***), trap [[Jer.5.26|Jer 5:26]] figurative ***set me before thee*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפָנֶיךָ‎</span>) [[Ps.41.13|Ps 41:13]] ***set me*** as a target [[Lam.3.12|Lam 3:12]]. 

**2.** ***set up, erect*** pillar (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצֵּבָה‎</span>) [[Gen.35.14|Gen 35:14]]; [[Gen.35.20|Gen 35:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.18.18|2Sam 18:18]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֵׁרִים‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.10|2Kgs 17:10]] altar [[Gen.33.20|Gen 33:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), stone-heap [[2Sam.18.17|2Sam 18:17]] monument (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַד‎</span>) [[1Sam.15.12|1Sam 15:12]] city-gates (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>), [[Josh.6.26|Josh 6:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) = [[1Kgs.16.34|1Kgs 16:34]]. 

**3.** ***cause to stand erect***, waters, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמוֺנֵֿד‎</span> [[Ps.78.13|Ps 78:13]] (compare **Qal** [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]]). 

**4.** ***fix, establish*** boundary (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Deut.32.8|Deut 32:8]]; [[Ps.74.17|Ps 74:17]]; [[Prov.15.15|Prov 15:15]] dominion <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(יַדׅ‎</span> [[1Chr.18.3|1Chr 18:3]] (of king). — [[1Sam.13.21|1Sam 13:21]] is dubious; [[BDB#AV|AV]] ***sharpen***, [[BDB#RV|RV]] ***set***; [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] '***gerade machen'***; [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצַּב‎</span> substantive, see below; compare [[BDB#HPS|HPS]].

**Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֻצַּב‎</span> [[Nah.2.8|Nah 2:8]] ***it is fixed, determined*** (Kl Or), but very dubious; perhaps proper name, or epithet, of queen, compare [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]], q. v.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֻלָּם נֻצּב אַ֫רְצָה‎</span> [[Gen.28.12|Gen 28:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***a ladder set up on the earth***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלוֺן מ‎</span> [[Judg.9.6|Judg 9:6]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלוֺן הַמַּצֵּבָה‎</span> [[BDB#GFM|GFM]], see below — compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצב‎</span> **Hithpa\`el**
